This novel is a true mood lifter, skillfully combining suspense and humor. I found myself laughing out loud, making it a memorable and enjoyable read. The characters, particularly Rosie, made a lasting impact.
conclusion: This novel is a fantastic addition to Richard Osman’s repertoire, delivering a thrilling yet cozy mystery with unforgettable characters and a plot full of twists and humor. I highly enjoyed the story and am eagerly looking forward to more adventures from the We Solve Murders agency.
